outline:
1. to hang, languish, hang down, be low
    1. (Qal)
      1. to hang low
      2. to be low
      3. of distress (fig.)
      4. to languish, look weakly (of eyes)
    2. (Niphal) to be brought low, be laid low
kjv_def: bring low, dry up, be emptied, be not equal, fail, be impoverished, be made thin.
strongs_def: to slacken or be feeble; figuratively, to be oppressed
